desc: Industrial-strength performance. Compliant with OSHA requirements. Mobile and reliable yet simple and affordable. Have it all with the Fume Boss Portable Fume Extractor.

layout.text: Capture Dangerous Welding Smoke with FUME BOSS

FUME BOSS Portable Fume Extractors ideal are for welding, soldering, grinding and deburring. Compliant with OSHA requirements. Protect the air you breathe and protect yourself. Free shipping throughout the 48 contiguous United States and Canada.
